website_summaries.verdict: A challenging LEGO Creator set with festive appeal that makes a perfect gift, thanks to the the holiday train theme.
pros: Features a lovely train theme with holiday decor that makes it reminiscent of classic Christmas train sets
Includes 5 mini-figures and lots of detailed accessories
Parents and kids love that the tree the train hauls rotates as it moves along the track
cons: You'll need more track pieces if you want it to go around a full-sized Christmas tree

customer_reviews.title: Cute set, does not include motor!
customer_reviews.text: I should have known that the price seemed a little low and read the details more clearly. This train is adorable and perfect for the holidays, but if you want it to run you need to buy all the "power functions" accessories seperately. You need 8879, 8884, 88000, 88002. All together these pieces should be right around $55. Get them directly from the LEGO company--they're being sold at ridiculously high prices on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: Runs too fast!!! Solution!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you buy the parts to motorize it (88000&88002) it will run TOO FAST unless you also buy the remote control (Gee thanks Lego, more stuff to buy). There is a solution however! Like I pictured above you can take some of the batteries out and replace them with anything that makes contact. I used screws cut to the proper length as dummy batteries. With half the batteries gone it runs slow enough it wont jump the tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Eisele family

customer_reviews.title: Small sized train, too cute for words, can be motorized.
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 train sets. This is the smallest set by far. It's adorable. If you want it to go around the tree, you need to spend more money for on these items: (1) More track. Lots more track. - This set barely has enough track to go around a Poinsettia plant. (2) Power functions - contains everything you need to motorize it, including a remote. - Fair warning. The same Power Functions kit also powers much larger train sets. On this set, we're talking Warp 9, engage!
customer_reviews.author: Reviews -R- Us

customer_reviews.title: the perfect family Christmas lego project!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as something for the family to do together, and it didn't disappoint! As always, the instructions are clear, pieces fit together perfectly, and stay together! The details are awesome: smoke coming from the stack, functioning wheels, one train car has a tree on it that revolves as the train moves, with a miniature train circling! There are also mini 'toys' included that really added to the theme perfectly! I fully recommend! I also purchased "LEGO City Flexible Toy Tracks Set", since the kit has only circular track pieces, and I wanted an oval layout. Everything fits, everything works.
customer_reviews.author: scott wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Make it a LEGO Christmas train under your tree this year!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: + Very nice looking Christmas train + Christmas tree rotates while train moves + Excellent addition of small Christmas toys + Can add in power functions very easily Cons: - None. Overall: A must for any LEGO fan during Christmas time. I bought this December 2017 and it really completed the Christmas tree, but the best part is that it's a LEGO Christmas train! Only thing to note is that f you want the train to encircle your Christmas presents, you will need to buy more track to enlarge the circle. The provided track is around 3 feet in diameter,so it will be hidden under the tree and by the presents.
customer_reviews.author: Allan J

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas just after Thanksgiving and I'm happy I did
customer_reviews.text: Hands down a must have Lego set for any avid Lego lover! I purchased this for my husband for Christmas just after Thanksgiving and I'm happy I did, as it later sold out completely! It was received by my husband very well as he has always wanted a Christmas Lego train! We look forward to putting this set together year after year each Christmas, it will be a new family tradition!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Nice show piece if you don't want it to move. If you do, plan on spending more
customer_reviews.text: The train looks great, and makes for a great addition around an xmas tree. What I don't like is that there is no official power function bundle; you have to buy them separate and then rebuild the locomotive and tender to accommodate them. What's more, if you are inclined to incorporate the lego led headlights, you have to completely re-invent the chimney stack for them to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great new family tradition
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as our family train. It is bright and colorful and perfect for a Christmas Train. It looks like it will be a great holiday tradition for many years to come. We bought the motors and remote. It was very easy to put together despite the detail and small part. The christmas tree even spins as the train moves. If you have little ones, the train does come apart very easily. We also bought the train depot (it was a gift to my husband). The Depot comes with 4 extra tracks to lengthen the train. yay. No regrets on buying this train!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ann Roberts

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PIECES
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our kids as an early Christmas present to build ahead of time and put the train around and under the Christmas tree. We built the entire thing with our kids, bought the motor, extra track, etc. Everything was going great and then we were down to the caboose and it is missing the two axles, which hold the wheels on, so you can't use it! Contacted Lego immediately and tried to get the replacement parts from Lego and they are out stock!! Will we be able to enjoy this under the Christmas tree this year? Not sure yet! Still cute set, still like Lego, just disappointed. We have never had a set missing pieces before.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A fun build
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. The build is relatively easy, especially as my grandson helped me do it! (He's the LEGO expert) The pieces hold together well which is important because this is a product which is better when played with as opposed to simply displayed. My favorite features include the color scheme and the theme (Christmas) including a cool Christmas tree which rotates as the train moves!
customer_reviews.author: Storyteller Studios

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Xmas train
customer_reviews.text: Bouthmmght this for my husband's Xmas eve bday. He loves that he'll be able to put it around the tree and begin collecting his own Xmas Lego village underneath the tree. The parts to make the train move are not included, but he was able to easily find them at the Lego store. This does require 9 AAA batteries. The train is detailed and you'll want more tracks if you intend for it to wrap around the base of a big tree. I think the amount of tracks included were the circumference of a small hula hoop. Worth the money and we'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as always
customer_reviews.text: Really, it's a Lego train set. It is a very nice set and we loved putting it together. I next need to motorize it so that it will run on remote control next year for Christmas. I really appreciate all the little details in the train, especially the miniature locomotive around the tree. Seriously, how cool to have a Lego train going around the tree that, also, has a Lego train going around a tree?
customer_reviews.author: R. MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Addictive!
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those adults newly come to the world of LEGO. I was impressed with how enjoyable the build was, and the final product is very cute. I had one missing (lost? ) piece, and LEGO promptly mailed me another. SInce then, I've got more pieces of the Christmas Village, extra track, and I have BIG plans for my holiday display next year!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun Building
customer_reviews.text: Cool train set for Christmas and setting up around the tree. Was fun building and playing with the parts. Cons: Not supplied with much track, need to buy motor, need to buy battery packet, need to buy Six AAA batteries. Lego definitely nickle and dimes you on this set.
customer_reviews.author: XiGua

customer_reviews.title: Fun Train Set (get add on parts)
customer_reviews.text: Hard enough to challenge a teen that is a master Legoman. Took a lot of time designing his track (add one are available and suggested if you want more than a circle). Christmas decor can be swapped out with extra parts for a year round look. TRAIN does NOT move UNLESS you buy multiple ADD-ON parts. It adds to the expense but it's made lego more fun because it CAN move by battery. Very detailed set.
customer_reviews.author: CypressTX

customer_reviews.title: ChoCho - great Lego Train set
customer_reviews.text: Not sure who liked this more, mom or daughter (11yr old). Great time together building this great lego set!!! End result - wonderful looking train.
customer_reviews.author: WV Mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for Lego fans
customer_reviews.text: A cute holiday train that I expect will be assembled every Christmas. I bought a little tree (an 18" frosted one)to display in the center. I think one of the Lego Christmas buildings would be nice to display with this. Note: In order to make the train run, I purchased 4 pieces separately on the Lego site. It's for ages 12 and up, with over 700 pieces; my 13-year old had it assembled the next day. It was his favorite gift.
customer_reviews.author: thrifty shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: We got this as an activity to do together ailatice night. It took several fun hours for two adults The detail is wonderful -- the tree even rotates.and you can get lego parts to make it motorized. It comes with plenty of track to go around an average xmas trwe
customer_reviews.author: D. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Installed around the Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: Great addition for the Christmas Tree. Make sure you buy extra track.
customer_reviews.author: J. Craw

customer_reviews.title: Purchased two of these, the girls (7 & 9) and the boys (both 7) were very excited
customer_reviews.text: Best Christmas present! This is great because they have to build the train first and then they still get to run it for years to come. We also bought the package to motorize the train (they may need help with This) They left our house asking if they could start right away.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this train to go around my Christmas village and it was so pretty. Make sure you purchase the motor and remote components if you want it powered.
customer_reviews.author: Gail H

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas decoration!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love. This comes out every Christmas with the rest of our decorations and then goes around our Christmas tree. Great little build, fun to add a motor to. Bought for original retail price ($90) winter 2019.
customer_reviews.author: shawn m espinosa

customer_reviews.title: For kids who love trains
customer_reviews.text: Kid's love this set and the miniature "toys" are so neat! Christmas AND trains??? YES!! I also bought flexible tracks (7499) and switch tracks (7895) but the only downfall is that this isn't motorized. I have been on the hunt for the lego battery packs needed to run this train but so far little luck finding them at a reasonable price. Toys r us are out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The Kid loved it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love trains, and the special boy that got this train set loves his trains. momma said he has too many train sets so she wanted to get him something different. Well he loves legos and he loves his trains so we win.
customer_reviews.author: JEREMIAH

customer_reviews.title: Lego Train
customer_reviews.text: I love this lego train, I only wish that it came with the parts to make it an auto running train. But it is perfect as the first piece in my new yearly tradition of adding onto a whole Lego village for Christmas. I can't wait to grow my village and build these sets with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: rach

customer_reviews.title: Great Holiday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set, budget for buying the parts to motorize it as well. Completely worth it. The tree is adorable. I was concerned as others had complained about it not turning but we have had no problems. The construction did take some time, but our 5 eyar old assemebled the majority by himself so not to hard.
customer_reviews.author: Reno Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Love Lego trains
customer_reviews.text: What can I say... they are expensive for a box of plastic parts... but the quality is great. Over the years, we have put away the antique Lionel trains, and used lego trains under our Christmas Tree. They run smooth using the power functions unit, and I don't have to worry about the kids hurting them.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Meant to bring the family together . . .
customer_reviews.text: I had such a great time putting this together while everyone else did their own thing. Occasionally I got a curious one come over to find a piece for me! Otherwise it kept my hands busy while visiting! Better than screen time!
customer_reviews.author: D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Christmas train
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set my son loved this train was a huge hit the Christmas tree spins when train moved it comes with cute little gifts for train it’s absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.author: Raven gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Christmas Decor!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to accompany our lego christmas village arrangement. Loved it so much I later purchased the motor to make it run automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my nephew. Gave it a 4 star because the price for LEGO sets are ridiculous. Regardless, my 8 year old nephew finished it within 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.author: john nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Classic Christmas Train for Lego fans
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas set, and with extra track and a powered up setup, can be remote controlled, will need to switch the motor polarity by resoldering the leads (see on youtube)
customer_reviews.author: EOSfan

customer_reviews.title: Love this train
customer_reviews.text: My son has played with this train every day since we got it. If you love legos and you love trains and you love Xmas, this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: A million pieces lol!
customer_reviews.text: Having a son I should have known he would destroy it, took 4 hours putting together lol. He had fun with it so I'm satisfied with the product, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell Amison

customer_reviews.title: This Kego Train can be motorized!
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun for our 7 yr old GrandSon! Added extra track for variation! Next year we’ll add the electric components...
customer_reviews.author: MorningStar

customer_reviews.title: awesome build
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old loves this train. I was surprised at the size and the features overall. Nice LEGO build above my epectations

customer_reviews.title: Worth it 😁
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love this. Gave it to him December 1 so we could put it around a little Christmas tree for more decorations. He loved putting it together. Happy to add to it every year so he can add his touches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TONS of Missing Pieces - Would Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Tons of pieces missing. Very disappointed in this really expensive purchase. We picked this up for my 4 year old for Christmas and have already had to call in for parts 2 separate times. Christmas was almost 4 weeks ago and we STILL can't assemble because we've spent the entire process waiting on parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to build, fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: Some loved every part of this. He received two trains for his birthday and wanted to build this one first. We added in the motor and remote. Bought some extra track and it’s a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Dad of One

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Train
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! we set it under our tree and it looks amazing. It took me about three hours to build it (I'm very new to Lego building) and I had fun doing it with the help of my five year old. I'm going to get parts to make it run.
customer_reviews.author: shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: This set is over 700 pieces (734 actually) and it has been a complete joy to put together with my son. I recommend the motor pack and additional track pieces if you have any ambition to grow the theme. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Gary C.

customer_reviews.title: Great set, fun to build and play with once ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set, fun to build and play with once its done. I don't really mind it not having the electric parts, but be aware if doesn't if that was something you were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: tomatthe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful LEGO experience and beautiful Christmas Decoration
customer_reviews.text: Gift to all 4 of my children and husband. Everyone loves their train and brings out at Christmas. It is important for folks to know that battery and motor don’t come with. Need to order separately.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Westerfield

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old autistic grandson is in love with this train. I got it for him for Christmas. He did have help putting it together but is quickly learning how to put things together himself. In the meantime, this means the world to my train obsessed boy!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fun Family Tradition
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun putting this together as a family. Our five year old twins did most of the work. Instructions were easy to follow and now we have a fun tradition to build every Christmas. Only down side is that we naught the motor to make it go around our tree and it goes way too fast to stay on the track.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L. Goss

customer_reviews.title: Add another $100
customer_reviews.text: Everything lego is over priced but not to bad putting the motor on this. Just plan to spend an extra $100 for everything you need to make it remote controlled.
customer_reviews.author: Jake zee

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson built in less than a day. He likes it. Is now adding power accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Anniebluez

customer_reviews.title: The train itself is great. I feel that I was duped
customer_reviews.text: The train itself is great. I feel that I was duped. There is no power pack with this set. Highly disappointed considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: KKillman

customer_reviews.title: Legos
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad you can say about Legos. My order came in as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Hard but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Normally my daughter can put her LEGO gifts together all by herself but even my husband and I had to help. Good thing we started in November so we could have it up and running for Christmas.......but we love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarge54

customer_reviews.title: Lego Winter Holiday
customer_reviews.text: Recalled. Needed many parts to run. Amazon didn’t sell the parts.
customer_reviews.author: IBM

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas buy
customer_reviews.text: Kids 8 & 11 loved this as a pre-Christmas present, instead of a gingerbread house that's sticky and messy we bought this & the lego gingerbread house this year.
customer_reviews.author: ccifani33

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I assembled this and had a blast. Beautiful set, tons of fun. Does NOT come with a motor. Those are extra and youll need 2 to 4 extra pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is the most precious LEGO set I’ve ever seen. My son got it for Christmas, along with the train station and when they are both put together they are adorable!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mindy dotson

customer_reviews.title: Derailed
customer_reviews.text: As with all LEGO’s, the challenge is in the build. That’s a good thing for this train because the cars keep detailing and coming of the track. I’m certainly happy that I didn’t purchase the engine because it would be unusable. Otherwise, the train looks great in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Yeller

customer_reviews.title: Great season show piece
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Christmas season show piece! And fun to build together!
customer_reviews.author: Jaci Earnest

customer_reviews.title: Be warned it does not come with the motor and remote pack
customer_reviews.text: Nice train for the holidays. Fun to build. Be warned it does not come with the motor and remote pack. That is a separate purchase. 9 year old put it together in about 30 min.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: was fun to put together, putting under small tree in rv
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to my Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: Looks great circling my Christmas tree. The included track is pretty short, so you might want to buy some more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift and it provided hours of entertainment. We are considering the optional motor.
customer_reviews.author: OJB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and big. Bought the extra accessories to turn it into an electronic train
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C

customer_reviews.title: Fun build, looks good around a xmas tree
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun build. It took me maybe 3-4 hours over 2 nights to complete. I can't speak about how the tracks laid out from the box because I bought additional tracking to go around my xmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McVay

customer_reviews.title: Lego Christmas train is a holiday treat
customer_reviews.text: Cute train that we put together at Thanksgiving and will put it near the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Mariacray

customer_reviews.title: It looked very nice by the Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: My son got me into Lego and we put together a couple of sets together. This one included. It looked very nice by the Christmas tree. We also bought the Train Station.
customer_reviews.author: MCP CDP

customer_reviews.title: Lego box was banged with noticeable dents
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the Lego box has some noticeable dents not to sure it came like this originally or the damage was inflicted in process of being delivered. I am glad it arrived on the estimated date.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Drost

customer_reviews.title: Joyful Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. Was a Christmas gift that brought much joy!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I love the winter village theme. This is a great addition and is so cute! My kids love to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: A R

customer_reviews.title: It says 12+ but my 6 year old was doing it with help.
customer_reviews.text: It says 12+ but my 6 year old was doing it with help.
customer_reviews.author: no one

customer_reviews.title: Xmas train under the tree!
customer_reviews.text: I put a motor in and it put it under the xmas tree. One of the best holiday sets from LEGO.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L.

customer_reviews.title: Lego it’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: It is a terrific toy to share and spend your time with the family while the Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Arango

customer_reviews.title: Great Set to Build with Family
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and the train station set to build with our boys as a holiday tradition. Had a great time and look forward to doing so in future years.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen MN

customer_reviews.title: A great set to add to my winter collection
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. A great set to add to my winter collection. Build is straightforward and no missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set! The little tree on the car there twirls as the train moves!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Reckless

customer_reviews.title: excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: This was for my dad, he enjoys playing with legos Super cool, and big.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Though the dog managed to steal a few pieces and chewed them up to scrap..
customer_reviews.author: J. Plance

customer_reviews.title: Prefect!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 10 and 4 year old nephews. They loved it! Had it built in their own in half a day!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brown

customer_reviews.text: This train is wonderful. However, I would like to buy the components to power it and I can’t find them. I bought something suggested but it was not correct. Lego does not indicate on the box the item # needed?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas train from Lego
customer_reviews.text: WOW, what can I say this is just too cute. NOW I'm working on getting the holiday Santa shops and village to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Great set for young and old.
customer_reviews.text: As an AFOL, this set was a lot of fun to build and play with. I have it going around the track ahead of The Hogwarts Express.
customer_reviews.author: Fulci Lives!

customer_reviews.title: Arrival was quick.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it. He is still working on putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Roses

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This train is awesome. Was easily built, there are instructions to make it battery powered. We love it! Worked great under the Christmas tree
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my train
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my train!! My boys and I put it together Christmas morning. Did get a little expensive with all the motor parts to get it to move.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Train looks great and is easy to build!!
customer_reviews.text: Train is fantastic! It is good to know that you can by the motor components separately to operate the train. There are a total of (4) additional pieces needed to operate the train with the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Christmas train!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great addition to our Christmas LEGO collection!! We love it! Great quality!

customer_reviews.title: Pilar Express for the tree
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Had a ball assembling and have carefully put it up to bring out for annual tree event.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M. Silverstrim

customer_reviews.title: This was so fun to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was so fun to put together. Our kids ages 11 & 8 enjoyed it and put together most of it on their own. We will be adding a new Lego Christmas set every year #newfamilytradition

customer_reviews.title: Great for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun at Christmas. My 6 year old grandson put it together.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to put together and fun to play.
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be only for 6 year old's Christmas time play but he keeps it up still! Love it We want more tracks.

customer_reviews.title: My lego loving 12 yr old loved this set
customer_reviews.text: My lego loving 12 yr old loved this set. He likes these bigger sets that take longer to put together and are funner to play with.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful set my son was able to include with his ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful set my son was able to include with his huge collection. Every train lover needs this.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this he put it together himself. He is ten. He plays with is daily.
customer_reviews.author: john buckner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to sons Christmas decor
customer_reviews.text: The train was just perfect! We opted not to make it electronically controlled. My son, 7, was content just pushing it around the track. Relatively easy to assemble.....very festive!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Anna Manley

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 9-year old son and we added the components to motorize it and have the train make a journey around the Christmas tree. Another fabulous Lego project!

customer_reviews.title: s are always awesome. What can you say more
customer_reviews.text: LEGO,s are always awesome. What can you say more. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Have patience if a kiddo is putting it together
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful train, takes awhile to put it together though. Was a nice addition to the Christmas tree

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I believe our grandson it going to love this Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lori J.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Christmas set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Christmas addition to the tree. Kids love putting it together for each Christmas. Definitely get the power components.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Did you not come with electrical unit. Needed to purchase seperately
customer_reviews.author: B. Carinio

customer_reviews.title: Fun to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It is a Christmas gift for my grandson. He will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Helms

customer_reviews.title: Great train set
customer_reviews.text: Great but a bit tricky if you want to add the full moment kit. Would be nice if they added a few pieces with that in mind and some more track.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Williams

product_meta.title: LEGO Creator Expert Winter Holiday Train 10254 Christmas Train Set with Full Circle Train Track, Locomotive, and Spinning Christmas Tree Toy (734 Pieces)
product_meta.description: All aboard the LEGO Christmas train! Gather the family for some festive LEGO building fun with this charming train toy construction set featuring a full circle of train track, boarding platform with bench and lamppost, a power functions upgradable train engine with brick-built smoke bellowing from its stack, coal tender, flatbed wagon with a rotating holiday tree, toys and gifts, and a red caboose with a detailed interior and table. The train engine also features large and small red-colored locomotive wheels and the train is decorated with green wreaths, string lights and white tree elements. This LEGO Creator Expert building kit includes 5 minifigures.
feature_bullets: Kids and adults will have a blast building this LEGO Winter Holiday Christmas train building set. The included train track wraps a full circle around your Christmas tree, making it the perfect under the tree train set for the holiday season

The holiday LEGO train set includes a locomotive, caboose, 5 minifigures: a locomotive driver, ticket collector, grandmother, boy and a girl, plus festive green wreaths, decorative lights, and buildable micro toys for minifigures

Turn this LEGO train into a motorized train set with a Power Functions motor (not included), and watch as it rolls festively around the train track! LEGO Creator building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building

LEGO Creator Expert kits challenge both kids and adults to explore their creativity through exciting and fun building experiences. Dive into the festive details of this iconic LEGO Christmas train set and build a train the whole family will enjoy

The Holiday Christmas train in total measures over 4” high, 20” long and 2” wide. Curved rail track diameter measures over 27”. 734 pieces. A great LEGO Christmas gift for boys and girls over the age of 12 years old and adults of all ages.
